pages.text: Integrated Dynamics is a mod that allows you to build and manage complex networks for automation, information gathering, and logic operations. It focuses on the direct reading, manipulation, and display of in-world data.

$(l)Getting Started$() $(br2)Begin by locating a menril tree and processing its logs in a squeezer. A squeezer is useful in processing many items resulting in greater yields, especially ores, dyes, and other materials like blaze rods.

$(l)What Cool Things Are Possible?$() $(br2)- $(l)Automated Resource Processing$(): Use the Mechanical Squeezer to automate ore multiplying. $(br2)- $(l)Environmental Interaction$(): Create systems that react dynamically to changes in the world environment. $(br2)- $(l)Intelligent Networks$(): Construct networks that think and make decisions based on real-time data.
